title: Most accurate description of dependent variable

content.prompt: A researcher is planning an experiment to study aspects of forgetting. Which of the following most accurately describes what a dependent variable is for an experiment?

choices.label: Some aspect of a participantâ€™s response that is measured in an experiment
A factor that is manipulated by the experimenter in order to observe its effects on some other factor
A factor that can be used to predict how people in an experiment will respond
A factor that is equated for the experimental and the control group

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
